tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE centralized_logging_system (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name STRING,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_message STRING
)

CREATE TABLE cloud_service_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name VARCHAR(50),
    log_type VARCHAR(50),
    log_message TEXT,
    log_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE log_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    analysis_result TEXT,
    analysis_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (log_id) REFERENCES cloud_service_logs(log_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CloudServiceLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name VARCHAR(50),
    log_message TEXT,
    log_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ErrorLogs (
    error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT REFERENCES CloudServiceLogs(log_id),
    error_type VARCHAR(50),
    error_message TEXT,
    error_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE AuthenticationLogs (
    auth_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT REFERENCES CloudServiceLogs(log_id),
    user_id INT,
    auth_status VARCHAR(10),
    auth_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE SystemLogs (
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT REFERENCES CloudServiceLogs(log_id),
    system_name VARCHAR(50),
    log_level VARCHAR(10),
    log_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE CloudServiceMetrics (
	metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	service_name VARCHAR(50),
	metric_name VARCHAR(50), 
	metric_value FLOAT,
	metric_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CloudServiceErrors (
	error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	service_name VARCHAR(50),
	error_message TEXT,
	error_code INT,
	error_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
